p:
We can find the probability for the value of σ
max
τ( ρ) to belong to the single dependence Φ 3 regardless the grain size using the Wilkokson criterion
38 . The number of events for the sampling is 7 for small grains and 14 for the common grain size. The number of inversions is 5 and 93, correspondingly. The probability of the validity of the hypothesis that these two samplings belong to a single sequence is lower than 0.2%.
